translations: v．扭曲，变形：使身体或物体扭曲或弯曲成不自然的形状。
· The acrobat was contorting his body into amazing shapes.
杂技演员将身体扭曲成了惊人的形状。

sentences.sentence: Ken was contorting his face, trying to keep it inside.
sentences.translation: 肯恩正在扭他的脸，尝试保存里面的它。

sentences.sentence: Even at this distance she could see how his facial muscles were contorting.
sentences.translation: 甚至离这么远，她也能看见他面部的肌肉扭曲了。

sentences.sentence: And I practiced very, very hard by myself, standing in front of a mirror, trying to annunciate without contorting my face.
sentences.translation: 我刻苦练习，站在镜子前面，努力在发音时不把脸扭歪。
